interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Blue Sage De-Puffing Caffeine Eye Serum | Natural Anti-Aging Eye Treatment with Probiotics, Green Tea + Hyaluronic Acid Serum for Face to Tighten and Hydrate under Eye Skin, and Brighten Dark Circles Review Date: 2020/08/01 Store: Blue Sage Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.06 x 1.65 x 1.42 inches; 4.69 Ounces', 'UPC': '860004070450', 'Manufacturer': 'Blue Sage Skin Co'} Review Text: The product itself works okay around my eyes as the listing stated it would and helps my under eye area look noticeably better. It blends easily into the skin, and I did not need to use very much. I like that you can also use it on your entire face if needed. I tried that also, and found that while it brightens my face a bit, I do still need to apply a moisturizer over it to get proper hydration for my dry skin. This serum has a very subtle, barely noticeable scent which is pleasant.

Sadly, the pump dispenser on the bottle I received does not work at all. It does turn to lock and unlock, but no matter what I did the pump did not work. So in order for me to use it I have to unscrew the cap every time, pull the pump tube out, and wipe some product from the pump tube. This serum is very thick and more like a gel, so it is way too thick to tilt the bottle and expect a drop to come out. The defective dispenser pump was a disappointment. Review Title: Serum works but pump doesn’t Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Higher Education Skincare: Goal Digger - Silky Moisturizing Cucumber Creme; formulated for dry and sensitive skin; cucumber extract; natural extract: melon, kale, cabbage, ginger, turmeric - 1.7 fl oz Higher Education {'Brand': 'Higher Education', 'Scent': 'Cucumber', 'Item Form': 'Creme', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.88 x 2.88 x 2.13 inches; 7.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '811381032050'} This is one of the most refreshing moisturizers I have tried, and I really like this one a lot! It is very creamy and pale green in color, goes on smooth, and has a wonderful cucumber smell, but is much more subtle and not overpowering. I have very dry skin, so am very happy that this moisturizer applies easily and absorbs into the skin very well. It definitely makes dry skin look more alive. Definitely a 5 star moisturizer! Wonderful cucumber scent Blue Sage De-Puffing Caffeine Eye Serum | Natural Anti-Aging Eye Treatment with Probiotics, Green Tea + Hyaluronic Acid Serum for Face to Tighten and Hydrate under Eye Skin, and Brighten Dark Circles Blue Sage {'Package Dimensions': '6.06 x 1.65 x 1.42 inches; 4.69 Ounces', 'UPC': '860004070450', 'Manufacturer': 'Blue Sage Skin Co'} The product itself works okay around my eyes as the listing stated it would and helps my under eye area look noticeably better. It blends easily into the skin, and I did not need to use very much. I like that you can also use it on your entire face if needed. I tried that also, and found that while it brightens my face a bit, I do still need to apply a moisturizer over it to get proper hydration for my dry skin. This serum has a very subtle, barely noticeable scent which is pleasant.

So in order for me to use it I have to unscrew the cap every time, pull the pump tube out, and wipe some product from the pump tube. This serum is very thick and more like a gel, so it is way too thick to tilt the bottle and expect a drop to come out. The defective dispenser pump was a disappointment. Serum works but pump doesn’t
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Skin Type:** Prefers products suitable for dry and sensitive skin.
- **Product Preferences:** Enjoys creamy moisturizers and serums that are refreshing and hydrating, particularly those with natural extracts. Recent interactions show an interest in eye products that also have multifunctional use on the face.
- **Scent Preference:** Appreciates subtle, refreshing scents, particularly cucumber, but is also open to very subtle, barely noticeable scents that are pleasant and not overpowering.
- **Application Experience:** Values smooth application and good absorption. Recent experiences highlight the importance of the product's usability and packaging, particularly the need for functional dispensing mechanisms.
- **Quality Expectations:** Prioritizes high-quality products with effective results, often reflected in a high rating given to products. However, recent experiences have shown that product functionality can impact overall satisfaction.
- **Brand Affinity:** Shows a preference for brands that focus on skin health, natural ingredients, and effective formulations, but is also attentive to product usability.

Overall, this user seeks multifunctional moisturizers and serums that deliver significant hydration while providing a satisfactory sensory experience. They emphasize both the effectiveness of the product and the importance of functional packaging.
